name: CANNABIS BUSINESS ASSOCIATION OF ILLINOIS
description: CBAI represents cannabis businesses licensed by state of IL as well as other stakeholders
sampleDescriptions:
SAFE Banking (HR 1595/S 1200).

CBAI supports reform that would allow cannabis businesses access to traditional financial services which they are currently denied because of discrepancies between federal law and state-legal cannabis
